main event: An Air Force officer at Edwards AFB, California observed an unidentified flying object on February 6, 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as silver in color, round or oval in shape, and made a rapid ascent and descent during the sighting.
The sighting lasted approximately 3 to 5 minutes.
The report contains a detailed description of the sighting by the observer.
The object was first observed hovering or maintaining a stationary position, then made a rapid ascent and rapid descent.
The report was later evaluated, but there was insufficient information to determine the exact identity of the object observed.
